languages.text: "Я заставил твое тело умереть... на короткое время. А затем заставил его заработать снова. Для меня подобный трюк — мелочь, я способен вернуть к жизни даже порубленные на куски останки. Но на тебя я бы не стал тратить время — ты не заслуживаешь таких усилий".

"I made your body perish... for a short time. And then I bade it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."
languages.original_text: "Я заставил твое тело умереть... на короткое время. А затем заставил его заработать снова. Для меня подобный трюк — мелочь, я способен вернуть к жизни даже порубленные на куски останки. Но на тебя я бы не стал тратить время — ты не заслуживаешь таких усилий".

traits.locale_text: "I bid your body perish... for a short time. And then I bid it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

"I bid your body perish... for a short time. And then I bid it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

"I bade your body perish... for a short time. And then I bade it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

"I bade your body perish... for a short time. And then I bade it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

"I made your body perish... for a short time. And then I bade it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

languages.text: 「私はお前の肉体に、しばし息絶えるよう命じたのだ。そして、再び機能するよう命じた。このような操作など、私ほどの者にかかれば些細なことだ。例えばお前がバラバラに刻まれたとしても、生き返らせることができる。だが、私はお前に時間を費やすつもりはないーーそのような価値は、お前にはない」
languages.original_text: "I made your body perish... for a short time. And then I bade it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: 「私はお前の肉体に、しばし息絶えるよう命じたのだ。そして、再び機能するよう命じた。このような操作など、私ほどの者にかかれば些細なことだ。例えばお前がバラバラに刻まれたとしても、生き返らせることができる。だが、私はお前に時間を費やすつもりはないーーそのような価値は、お前にはない」

languages.text: “我摧毁了你的身体……只持续了很短一段时间，之后让它再次运转起来。对我这样的人而言，这样的小手术微不足道。哪怕你被切成了肉末，我也一样能把你复活。不过，我并不会真的在你身上如此大费周章，你不值得我这么浪费时间。”
languages.original_text: "I made your body perish... for a short time. And then I bade it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: “我摧毁了你的身体……只持续了很短一段时间，之后让它再次运转起来。对我这样的人而言，这样的小手术微不足道。哪怕你被切成了肉末，我也一样能把你复活。不过，我并不会真的在你身上如此大费周章，你不值得我这么浪费时间。”

languages.text: « J'ai ordonné à votre corps de mourir... pendant un temps. Puis, je lui ai ordonné de fonctionner à nouveau. Ces manipulations ne me coûtent rien. Même si votre corps était mis en pièces, je pourrais vous ramener à la vie. Enfin, je ne perdrais pas mon temps avec vous... Vous n'en valez pas la peine. »
languages.original_text: "I made your body perish... for a short time. And then I bade it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai ordonné à votre corps de mourir... pendant un temps. Puis, je lui ai ordonné de fonctionner à nouveau. Ces manipulations ne me coûtent rien. Même si votre corps était mis en pièces, je pourrais vous ramener à la vie. Enfin, je ne perdrais pas mon temps avec vous... Vous n'en valez pas la peine. »

languages.text: «He ordenado a tu cuerpo que muriera... por un momento. Y luego le he ordenado que funcionara otra vez. Estas manipulaciones son futesas para alguien como yo. Aunque te despedazaran, podría devolverte a la vida. Aunque no perdería el tiempo, no mereces el esfuerzo».
languages.original_text: "I made your body perish... for a short time. And then I bade it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: «He ordenado a tu cuerpo que muriera... por un momento. Y luego le he ordenado que funcionara otra vez. Estas manipulaciones son futesas para alguien como yo. Aunque te despedazaran, podría devolverte a la vida. Aunque no perdería el tiempo, no mereces el esfuerzo».

languages.text: "Ich gebot Eurem Körper zu sterben ... für kurze Zeit. Und dann gebot ich ihm, wieder zu funktionieren. Derartige Manipulationen sind für jemanden wie mich Bagatellen. Selbst wenn Ihr in Stücke gehackt würdet, könnte ich Euch ins Leben zurückholen. Wobei ich meine Zeit nicht mit Euch vergeuden würde ... Ihr seid die Mühe nicht wert."
languages.original_text: "I made your body perish... for a short time. And then I bade it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebot Eurem Körper zu sterben ... für kurze Zeit. Und dann gebot ich ihm, wieder zu funktionieren. Derartige Manipulationen sind für jemanden wie mich Bagatellen. Selbst wenn Ihr in Stücke gehackt würdet, könnte ich Euch ins Leben zurückholen. Wobei ich meine Zeit nicht mit Euch vergeuden würde ... Ihr seid die Mühe nicht wert."

languages.text: "Bedenini devre dışı bıraktım. Kısa bir süreliğine. Ardından yeniden faaliyete geçirdim. Bu tip manipülasyonlar benim gibi biri için son derece olağandır. Parçalara bile ayrılsan seni hayata geri döndürebilirim. Ama tabii zamanımı senin için harcamam. Uğraştığıma değmezsin."
languages.original_text: "I made your body perish... for a short time. And then I bade it function again. Such manipulations are trifles for one such as I. Even if you were to get hacked into pieces, I could bring them back to life. Although I would not waste my time on you — you are not worth the effort."

traits.locale_text: "Bedenini devre dışı bıraktım. Kısa bir süreliğine. Ardından yeniden faaliyete geçirdim. Bu tip manipülasyonlar benim gibi biri için son derece olağandır. Parçalara bile ayrılsan seni hayata geri döndürebilirim. Ama tabii zamanımı senin için harcamam. Uğraştığıma değmezsin."
